模块 davidchangx.math
程序包 xyz.davidchangx.mathtool

类 OperatorMapGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.davidchangx.mathtool.OperatorMapGenerator
  • public class OperatorMapGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Tool class to generate operator map required by Expression conveniently. Required a list of available Operator classes. The list shoule be in format: + xyz.davidchangx.algorithms.math.operator.Plus basic - xyz.davidchangx.algorithms.math.operator.Minus basic which consist of lines like "format_in_expression_string\tcomplete_classname\toptional_group_info". We suggest that you provide a group info field so that you can use getOperatorMapByGroupPattern(java.io.File,java.lang.String) method to generate operator map more conveniently. We provide package xyz.davidchangx.algorithms.math.operator as the default Operator library and "operators.lst" as a list sample. You can directly use this list file when you use this class to generate operator maps with Operator-s in xyz.davidchangx.algorithms.math.operator.
    版本:
    4.5
    作者:
    David Chang

      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Operator> getBasicOperatorMap​(java.io.File operatorList)
      Generates an operator map containing the operators belonging to the group "basic".
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Operator> getCompleteOperatorMap​(java.io.File operatorList)
      Generates an operator map containing all the operators listed in the given operator list.
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Operator> getHyperbolicTrigonometricOperatorMap​(java.io.File operatorList)  
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Operator> getIntegerTheoryOperatorMap​(java.io.File operatorList)
      Generates an operator map containing the operators belonging to the group "integer_theory".
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Operator> getInvTrigonometricOperatorMap​(java.io.File operatorList)
      Generates an operator map containing the operators belonging to the group "inverse_trigonometric".
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Operator> getLogicalOperatorMap​(java.io.File operatorList)
      Generates an operator map containing the operators belonging to the group "logical".
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Operator> getOperatorMapByGroupPattern​(java.io.File operatorList, java.lang.String opGroupPattern)
      Generates an operator map containing the operators belonging to the group name of which matches the given regex pattern.
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Operator> getSingularFunctionoOperatorMap​(java.io.File operatorList)
      Generates an operator map containing the operators belonging to the group "singular".
      static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Operator> getTrigonometricOperatorMap​(java.io.File operatorList)
      Generates an operator map containing the operators belonging to the group "trigonometric".

    • 方法详细资料

      • getCompleteOperatorMap

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Operator> getCompleteOperatorMap​(java.io.File operatorList)
                                                                           throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                                                  java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                                                  java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                                                  java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                                                  java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                                                                  java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Generates an operator map containing all the operators listed in the given operator list.
        参数:
        operatorList - the operator list
        抛出:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if one operator class file wasn't found
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the proper construction method wasn't found
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if one operator object cannot be instantiated correctly
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if OperatorMapGenerator doesn't have the privilege to access an operator class or its construction method.
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the given operator list file wasn't found

      • getOperatorMapByGroupPattern

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Operator> getOperatorMapByGroupPattern​(java.io.File operatorList,
                                                                                        java.lang.String opGroupPattern)
                                                                                 throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                                                        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException,
                                                                                        java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                                                        java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                                                        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException,
                                                                                        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Generates an operator map containing the operators belonging to the group name of which matches the given regex pattern.
        参数:
        operatorList - the operator list
        opGroupPattern - the regex pattern to determine the target group
        抛出:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if one operator class file wasn't found
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if the proper construction method wasn't found
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if one operator object cannot be instantiated correctly
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if OperatorMapGenerator doesn't have the privilege to access an operator class or its construction method.
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the given operator list file wasn't found
